FILE: cm434475v11.0.txt
DYAD: BENIN - NIGERIA
RIVALRY: RIV1057
DISPUTE(S): MID4312 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180914
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180914


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID4312

TERRMID: MID4312 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4312 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4312 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4312 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4312 3 -- uncertain
ISLMID-NOTES: MID4312 from Gibler 2018, Niger occupied Lete Island which is owned by Benin. Benin protested. Coded not islansd because Benin and Nigeria did not dispute any islands, and coded uncertain because Nigeria is not involved in this dispute. COW probably erroneously included Nigeria in this dispute rather than Niger. Version 4 of the MID data shows this dispute only in dyad 434436.

CIVWARMID: MID4312 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4312 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4312 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4312 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4312 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 




RIVNOTES: 


NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:


SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
